title: VP Pence: White House coronavirus task force could wind down work by early June
text:
VP Pence: White House coronavirus task force could wind down work by early June Share Shares Copy Link Copy

Hide Transcript Show Transcript

I'm leaving for Arizona. We're going to be at the Honeywell plant, which is doing great work for us. On it will be, I think, a great day. I love Arizona. Say it. I think it's a Basque facility, right? If it's a mask facility, I will, Yeah, I don't know if its a mask facility, but we have to open our country. So you have all reports. Look, models have been very inaccurate. I've seen models, they're very inaccurate. But you know, one model that's very important is that if we did this a different way, we would have lost more, much more than two million people and we did it the right way. We did everything right. But now it's time to go back to work. They're going back to work safely, but they're going back to work. We're opening up our country again. This is what we're doing. And I'll tell you, the whole world is excited watching us because we're leading the world. I don't have any. Everybody traveling has been tested. We have great testing and literally they've been tested over the last hour and the test result comes back in five minutes. We have great testing or they wouldn't be allowed to travel with him in. I would say it's not my choice. It's a very strong group of people that want to make sure they are tested, including Secret service. So they're all tested, everybody traveling on the plane.
